dcterms:creator: K. D. Julian
M. J. Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training DNN controllers for aircraft collision avoidance systems, which includes neural networks as controllers and safety properties defined for various input constraints.
dcterms:title: HorizontalCAS

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A benchmark for reinforcement learning that simulates a vertical rocket landing model, where the agent learns to control the rocket's dynamics to land safely on a moving barge.
dcterms:title: Rocket Lander
